thread.title: Would have given them 5 stars if there was a fridge in the room
thread.title_full: Would have given them 5 stars if there was a fridge in the room - Review of Four Points by Sheraton Midtown - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: HighHorse
title: Would have given them 5 stars if there was a fridge in the room
text:
This place has it spot on. It doesn't promise the world, it promises clean and tidy, Starwood service in a handy location. And it delivers.
We had a great reception from Ari, and were allocated one of the renovated rooms. These are lovely. Yes they are small, however they are manageable. We didn't eat in the restaurants, but did avail ourselves of the ice machine and vending machines in the basement.
A refrigerator in the room would have completed the package. Can't think of the last hotel I stayed in that didn't have one!
